title: Service disruption on Sengkang-Punggol LRT systems due to a power fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 由于电力故障，盛港-榜鹅轻轨系统服务中断
title_translations.ms: Gangguan perkhidmatan di sistem LRT Sengkang-Punggol akibat kerosakan bekalan elektrik
title_translations.ta: சக்தி தவறு காரணமாக செங்காங்-புங்கோல் LRT அமைப்புகளில் சேவை இடையூறு

updates.text: Service on the Sengkang-Punggol LRT systems has resumed. Free regular and bridging bus services have ceased. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
Service on the Sengkang-Punggol LRT systems has resumed. Free regular and bridging bus services are still available at designated stops.

Please be informed that there is no service on the Sengkang-Punggol LRT systems due to a power fault. Free regular and bridging bus services are available at designated stops. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused.
